title: How do I play songs in the background, quit Music, and view the lyrics when a song is playing?
answer:
Play in background: Touch Music and play an audio clip. Touch the home key, and the song is playing in the background. 

 Quit Music: On the music playing screen, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112768) then Exit. In the displayed dialog box, touch OK. 

 Play lyrics with songs: If the lyrics of a song are saved in the same folder as the song, the phone automatically displays the lyrics while the song is playing. On the music playing screen, flick to the left to display the lyrics.
